website_summaries.verdict: Samsung packs buzz-worthy features like S Pen and HDR support into its new premium Galaxy Tab S3, but without a keyboard packed in, it's still more about content consumption than creation.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S3 is an elegantly designed tablet that comes with a capable stylus
It has a stunning AMOLED screen, fingerprint sensor for extra security and satisfyingly loud quad speakers
It's also the first HDR-ready tablet
cons: Despite the hype, HDR content is not available on the tablet yet
Large games take time to load
The keyboard add-on is an expensive extra

customer_reviews.title: Bought this in May, system is broken suddenly in ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in May, system is broken suddenly in 5 months. It went into endless reboot loop. Returned back to Amazon, still waiting for a refund. Please be aware to buy this item, as there clearly is a manufacturing defect.
customer_reviews.author: umut gomceli

customer_reviews.title: I love it, but Samsung failed to produce something with ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it, but Samsung failed to produce something with the same quality of the Note 10.1 (2014). Especially when it comes to the S-Note software. This new software is just horrible. If it weren't for OneNote, I wouldn't have used this tablet as often as I aspired. Pros: - Good Battery life and Excellent charging speed - Gorgeous display - S-Pen is still the best in the market - Perfect compromise between mobility and note-taking ability - Quite responsive Cons: - No S-Pen slot... seriously Samsung, what were you thinking?? - Glass back makes it glossy and fragile - Samsung Notes is essentially a downgrade from the feature-packed S-Note
customer_reviews.author: Ghaleb Hamadi

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. It is fast, the screen is very good, and the added functionality with the s pen is a great bonus. I bought this tablet because it was supposed to be easy to write on and this is true. It does a nice job of sensing your palm and ignoring it when you write. I use this tablet mostly to read on and take notes with the s pen. I also use it for some informal presentations because I can draw on the screen and illustrate points as I speak. Overall, I am very happy with this tablet and would recommend it to you.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: A disapointment
customer_reviews.text: Chrome freezes all the time, no way the have bookmarks organized. Slow unresponsive. If I could will send it back. A real POS. Support doesn't exist. the pictures & photos from website look like they are in Ultra Low Definition, it's really bad. Don't buy it, get a Laptop, a Chromebook or an Apple.
customer_reviews.author: JORGE LIGUORI

customer_reviews.title: Love my new tablet
customer_reviews.text: I am thoroughly enjoying my new Samsung tablet. My old one lasted for years and would still be going strong if I hadn't dropped it one too many times. I was, therefore, not hesitant to buy another. The clarity of the screen is so much better than my old one. The battery life is also incredibly improved. I also like the fact that it looks and navigates a lot like my Samsung cell phone so the learning curve is nil. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ldoro

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S3 9.7-Inch
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how well this thing works, my wife won't put it down. Tried to trade an iPad for it and she gave me one of those looks.
customer_reviews.author: incognito

customer_reviews.title: Great for notes/art
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. It might not be the best but it gets the job done. I mainly use it for handwritten notes, drawing, and a few games. Pros: love the s-pen, screen looks nice, doesn't feel sluggish Cons: sound echos with Dolby Atmos turned on, apple pencil is probably better (but also costs an extra $100, s-pen comes with tablet), not enough HD space, no option to turn off lighting on the bottom buttons
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Wow, just wow!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this tablet! I had the S2 and pretty much wore the thing out as my personal e-reader, theater, camera, etc. I liked the S2, so I was expecting something decent with the S3. Wow! Honestly, I can't think of a better description than wow! The pictures are sharp and clear and the camera is just amazing. I'm not as sold on the pen (clicking on the side doesn't seem to do anything, but that could easily be operator error), but the pen had 0% to do with my choice for going for another Samsung tablet. You will not regret buying this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Biggles

customer_reviews.title: Slow and janky - worst tablet I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst Android tabled I've ever owned. It's never been fast. After booting up, it takes a while to get into a state that can be considered reasonably usable. As usual on a Samsung tabled, it's bloated with useless apps, but even after disabling them the tablet is no smooth. Run away from this tablet if you want a decent Android experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet and keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I love this Android tablet with optional keyboard that I purchased. It's an awesome tablet. I give it 9 out of 10 stars. My only two minor complaints are 1) the garbage Samsung bloatware that I do not use or want. I haven't figured out how to remove or delete them. 2) I love the attached keyboard that I purchased extra. My minor comment is that when the keyboard and tablet are attached it connected it would be very nice if the tablet viewing angle could be adjusted i.e. raise the tablet or angle backwards to adjust your viewing when connected to the keyboard which itself works very well and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Graywolf0310

customer_reviews.title: this is a computer
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why no one knows about these things, but it does everything my $1500 computer does with a better picture. It was like $250 and I don't even need my computer. Samsung makes newer versions but just use this one if you find one, the new ones don't really have much more than this one. The pen you get if you buy the $30 keyboard works better than the apple pencil and you don't have to charge it either. I think this thing was a mistake, it does too much for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the S2 8" for years and love it, I really wanted the fast charging and the USB-C. The screen is nice, I'm really not a fan of the size - I liked my 8" S2 better. the really awful thing about it is that when yous scroll, the screen updates so slowly that anything on the screen appears to "warp" until you stop moving. For a device this expensive, I should never see something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I had a google pixel C tablet before. It died a little bit over a year (just right out of warrany) for some black screen problem. Before buying this I was hesitating for weeks between buying this or an ipad. Finally I went for this. Now, after using it daily for half a year, I think I've made the correct choice in terms of quality (never crashed so far), functionality(many adroid apps that I was used to), price(ipad with stylus and similar ram/size would be much more expensive). Happy with my purchase. I just hope this tablet will last at least three or five years. If it does, my next tablet will still be Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: January

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet and it's absolutely an upgrade from my Kindle Fire I was using. Almost got an iPad, but as usual, Android won me over. Love how slick, thin, and solid it feels, and the quality is perfect for everything I use it for. Sure it's not the BEST tablet on the market, but if you're looking for a reasonably priced droid tablet this is a good go-to. I've had zero issues after months use and hope to get many years of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: camerachick

customer_reviews.title: Better than anything else!
customer_reviews.text: Blown away by the beautiful screen and design. Quick and responsive. Light and easy to hold. You'll never go back to a phone or cheap tablets after using this. The only other time I was this amazed was when I bought the original ipad, and that thing was pretty amazing! Expensive but well worth $600
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Constant Dropped WiFi connections hurts
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tablet with great screen! Only issue is that it constantly drops the WiFi connection... eventually I figured out it’s because I disabled the bloatware office apps... why would that have anything to do with WiFi’s stability on the tablet?! Either way probably get an iPad Pro
customer_reviews.author: karim guirguis

customer_reviews.title: Much better. Took the iPad back
customer_reviews.text: I first bought Ann iPad Pro 10.5 but began to realize that video play was not as crisp as I thought it would be. Got to play it side by side to the Tab S3. Much better. Took the iPad back. The Tab S3 was a better price and comes with the pen which would have cost another$100 for the iPad. Wonderful tablet, great price and fast shipping. Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: stephen b

customer_reviews.title: Vivid colors, easy reading!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Tab S3 with the Spigen glass screen protector and the keyboard cover from Samsung. I am glad I installed the protector. The keyboard cover does not hold the tablet securely when closed but the keyboard works nicely with the tablet. I am not used to the on-screen keyboard. I have taken hundreds of pictures, downloaded books. It works great. I can see live TV shows with great sound also. My cat looks great in all the pictures. Great product all around. You may need to adjust the touch sensitivity if it does not respond as fast as you would like. Very easy to set up. Really sleek and good looking glass screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S3 is an excellent tablet!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tablet! I have been using extensively for a number of months now and it has not had a single glitch. No crashes, lock-ups or flaky behavior. None. It doesn't lose the WiFi connection ever. Android 7 is super stable. The OLED screen is extremely bright, when using it indoors I usually set the brightness to about 50%. Outdoors I can crank up the brightness and see it easily if not in direct sun. The processor is quite fast and it has plenty of memory. Battery life seems good too. With screen set at 50% brightness and constant use the tablet runs about 4 to 5 hours on a single charge. Absolutely no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: My poor tech-challenged dad had some trouble setting this up initially. Once we got through the setup he has been super-duper happy with it, and that's saying a lot since he's always been a Machead. I have an older generation of this tablet ... now I have tablet envy and want to upgrade!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny W

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade from Sony Z4 Tablet that broke.  Samsung bloatware slows this down.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly by Sony Z4 Tablet screen cracked. The Sony is a great Tablet, but flimsy chassis support for the screen. So went with this Samsung. There is more bloatware apps on there than the Sony, and this is not waterproof like the Sony. However, has nice quad speakers, nice screen, comes with a stylus I am yet to use yet. Accessories, like cases and screen protectors, are way more abundant than the Sony has. More onboard storage would have been nice, but 32 GB is decent. Also updated to Oreo 8.x. The Sony is not scheduled for the Oreo update. So considering the situation this was a good upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Longwood willy

customer_reviews.title: Finally a tablet worth having!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this tablet! It's fast, the display looks great, and the battery lasts several days of light use. The included stylus is very responsive, and best of all doesn't use batteries. The camera is the best I've seen on a tablet, and has a flash, which is a rarity for tablets. The Samsung notes app combined with the stylus is great for marking up photos and taking quick notes. I highly recommend this tablet if you're in the market.
customer_reviews.author: DiMarco Family

customer_reviews.title: Still an awesome tablet after 2 years use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in April 2018, so it's been a little over 2 years. I use this tablet every day, and it's held up great. Performance is still good, and the HDR AMOLED display is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: M. DeRoller

customer_reviews.title: Maybe This One Was Made On A Friday!!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet was a problem from day one. I should have a $1 for every call to Samsung tech Dept. Then I sent it into the tech people twice and by the third time in less than a year, I had enough!!!!........and Samsung finally gave me my money back!!! And I bought a iPad!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet, but charger cord and plug was damaged in packaging!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great tablet. I had read a lot of reviews before buying. I recently purchased one, and had to return it because it was defective. So I returned it and ordered another one. I really like it. Unfortunately the charger cord and plug was damaged in packaging, I guess. I've already gotten the tablet set up, now I'm undecided as to what to do. Ask for a new Samsung fast charging plug/cord, or what??? I don't want to return the tablet and wind up having to set up another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 32GB storage is essential - I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet, and I got an excellent deal - $473 which included the pen. The memory is so awesome. I can download movies & books for traveling, as well as work documents I need, & still have space. I like where the buttons are located, similar to my phone. The size is great. Love, love, love. Oh, and almost important as the storage size is the fast charging!! I LOVE the fast charging, it is so convenient. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymouz

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my Samsung Note 10.0
customer_reviews.text: Was so sad to have to replace my old NOTE 10.1 (battery no longer worked and replacing the battery didn't work very well). Found the Tab S3 to be comparable (had the pen, and good size, and great picture). It has been working wel, holding a charge very well, and it the perfect travel device for doing the basics (email, internet access, streaming videos)
customer_reviews.author: EBH

customer_reviews.title: Samsung prevails!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough positive things about this tablet. It is SO fun to use (especially the pen). It is fast, has a beautiful picture, excellent sound quality, and is the perfect size for me. I've owned both Apple and Samsung products and I'd say they are both quality brands, but Samsung always seems to be a better value geared to a bit more sophisticated user.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: The best pen professional tablet
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic tablet!!! I absolutely love it and use it daily. It is even "lapable" The screen is fantastic and the pen experience superlative. Overall, a great productivity device. The only place that it falls short is the main processor. It is not slow, but it is not as fast as Huawei's tablets. Samsung should have gone for the latest processor. However, I have to say that it works excellently even with many applications going on at the same time. In my view, it is superior to iPad Pro (and it is cheaper, too)
customer_reviews.author: Anastassios R.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the absolute best Samsung tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about the S3 especially the superior quality build and super fast responsiveness! The included S pen is wonderful and I am thoroughly enjoying using it (as someone who always uses a stylus.) First time experiencing a rapid charger and that is a major bonus for me. WiFi also doesn't seem to disconnect/reconnect nearly as often on this tablet so that is another plus. Highly Highly Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Paula C.

customer_reviews.title: Found a tablet to replace my old one finally
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful tablet, great for work and games, very solid build quality, awesomely bright display, great battery life. Very happy with this. I hope Samsung continues providing Android updates and doesn't fall too far behind. It is a really nice device.
customer_reviews.author: ChiWks

customer_reviews.title: Content about it...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this device to watch movies, tv and browsing the net. Worth the price I paid for. The touch screen is very responsive and movies are very good on screen. Battery life isn’t that great for watching full length movies. I could squeeze out 4 movies before I have to charge. But all in all I’m very content with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nhoj Divad

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet at a very competitive price
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is everything I thought it would be before I purchased it. I decided to upgrade from a Galaxy Note 10.1 which I purchased 3 years ago. This is lighter, faster, clearer with a vivid screen. The android system allows me to format the screens any way I want and the software is quite responsive. Great tablet at a very competitive price.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Borges

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tablet. After my Tab S2 was destroyed in a horrible dinning room chair incident, I bought a Fire HD tablet. So having used that inferior, dark, slow and confining piece of garbage it is shear joy to use this well functioning tablet. It has bright sharp image, it is fast in both processing and download compared to the Fire tablet. I am also not locked into using only Amazon apps, and my home screen isn't filled with useless Amazon apps. Thank you Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Kingfisher

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 years then bricked itself.
customer_reviews.text: Got stuck in reboot loop, finally got it into its version of safe mode after an hour of trying. There was a memory exception or error don't remember which it was late I forced a shut down. Now deosn't even recognize it is be charged or do anything at all.
customer_reviews.author: Redswar01

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tablet as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem getting this order from first non Amazon vendor. Tablet never arrived even though tracking said it was delivered. I don't know what happened but Amazon made it right and I was able to reorder. Tablet is just perfect for my needs in size, storage and with s pen to do art. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marilynn Morgan-Barth

customer_reviews.title: I love this little thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing! My Samsung Note 4 needs to be replaced, but it still works so I'm holding out. This tablet is the perfect solution. It's much better for reading and have been using it at work. Love the ability to write on my presentations and save the notes. So glad I purchased this instead of the Note 8. It's much more useful , cheaper and I can use my phone through it with the flow app too.
customer_reviews.author: mtenzel

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet around!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this tablet daily for well over a year now and still love it. It is compatible with the apps I want to use and the screen quality and size makes it great to stream. Easy to hook up to another screen to cast. Great battery life. Love the android system so easy to use and intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tab for Students.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when entering graduate school because I always lose my notebooks. Fantastic tablet for on-the-go activity. Opened SSH tunnel through my desktop and downloaded an SSH client to my tablet, and I have full connectivity wherever I am to a powerful computer setup with a pop-out interface in the form of my tablet. I find my productivity and ability to learn strongly improved now that I can have all of my notes and everything I need for classes right in one place.
customer_reviews.author: ericw95

customer_reviews.title: This tablet is a great thing to have when u don't want to take a full size computer with u!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet but it is a bit to big when using it!! I solved this problem by buying a case that folds so it can stand upright on a flat surface. This tablet is great! The display is amazing and I use the s-pen a lot that comes with the tablet, I mainly use the Tablet to play online games and to watch movies and shows when I travel!!!
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Gilchrist

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for almost a month and I have to say it is great. I did not get the keyboard, not much use for it with me, as the s pen was a driving reason to buy. Performance is great. Battery life great. Screen is the best to me. The blacks are always off with previous tablets and even phones however this screen has a true black that makes video much better. Sound is good too but I usually use headphones to not disturb those around me.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Cruse

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet but horrible battery performance
customer_reviews.text: Nice little tablet, performance is great but battery life is poor. To the point that I may try to return it. You use it for a couple of hours during the day, put it away for the evening and the battery is dead by the next morning. I've seen some posts that Samsung may correct this soon in a software update but for right now, until they fix this I would stay away. I would welcome Samsung support to contact me if there is a fix. Just for the record, having to remember putting the tablet in airplane mode after each use does not qualify as a "fix".
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Bain

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I love this tablet! I bought it because the S-Pen and I can say: it worths the price 500%. It is super responsive (handwriting), after the first 2 minutes of use it's like you are writing on a regular notebook. There are several apps to use the S-Pen, but I appreciate the fact that it comes with MS One Note pre-installed (as it is a multi-platform app, you can view/edit your notes on every other device: PC, Mac, Ipad, Android devices, Windows phone, ...).
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: SLOOOOOW and no NFC. REGRET BUYING
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by a friend over the iPad. WRONG. This thing is slooooooooow and not very intuitive at all compared to iOS. I gave it away to friend after a month. She used it for two weeks. Now it's gathering dust. Stick to the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: unkl

customer_reviews.title: Very user unfriendly
customer_reviews.text: This thing isn't intuitive at all. What makes it worse is that it has android 9 installed on it, when all instruction manuals for this device are for android 7. The two systems are completely different. So, you can't even get help, not even from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Beware !! Touchscreen may go bad.
customer_reviews.text: Initially loved the tablet. However, after 7 months the touchscreen suddenly does not respond to the HAND / FINGER. It only responds to the S-PEN. Researched it and it seems that this is a common problem with some Samsung products. Otherwise, great features............ Unfortunate !!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Holder

customer_reviews.title: Crap battery life and basically no internal storage
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it a 2 star review because the battery life and internal storage are absolute garbage. Screen quality is good overall functionality is great. The pen is everything I expected. But given that most apps are starting out at 100 MB file size I cant understand why samsung would only give their flagship tablet a 32 gig internal storage. Wish I would've returned it when I had the chance.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet I have ever owned and I have over a dozen
customer_reviews.text: I once thought my Tab S2 was the best - nope this next generation S3 is faster and really nice to work with. Having the stylus is nice; no place to store it is not so cool. But, I purchased a really nice Fintie Slim Shell Case to fit it from Amazon and the stylus holder designed into this case takes care of that one small issue.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Campbell Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this Tab S3....I have had iPads before this and find the S3 to be faster and a better display quality. I have come to prefer Android over iOS after having numerous devices of both operating systems. The S3 came packaged well and arrived a day ahead of schedule. It is too soon for me to evaluate the S Pen and the yet to be delivered keyboard case. Overall I am greatly pleased with the S3 tablet.
customer_reviews.author: homer

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. Had to replace my smaller Samsun one that I damaged. I love the size and got a good deal. I did not get the keyboard because I would never use it. It is a Tablet not a Computer. I love it when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Has officially replaced my Mini iPad!
customer_reviews.text: When I discovered the Samsung Galaxy phone no amount of convincing could make me EVER get an iPhone. BUT my computer and Mini iPad are both Apple products. I am slowly heading towards ONLY Samsung products. I LOVE my Samsung tablet as much as I love my Samsung phone. One of the best features on Samsung products is the camera. I also find Samsung products to be user-friendly. The shipper shipped the tablet to me EXTREMELY quickly which was a welcome surprise.
customer_reviews.author: theodora c.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung makes great electronics!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this new tablet to replace an old Samsung Note which still works but is a bit slow. The grands will be using the old one for games and as an e-reader. I travel with a tablet rather than lugging my laptop around. It's smaller and lighter and doubles as a Kindle. And it's easier on these old eyes than a smartphone! Samsung makes great android products.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tablet for Samsung Users!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new tablet.. it's super fast and has a beautiful display... if you are a Samsung smartphone user and are looking for a tablet, look no more... This is the device for you... If you have a samsung account it will transfer all of your apps and settings to the new device seamlessly!! A+ Samsung! You really hit it outta the park with this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is overall my favorite item to use. Couple it with a stand so you can watch movies and its perfect. Its touch sensitivity and high clarity makes it easy to forget you're on a tablet. I honestly watch movies plenty on this and the s-pen works very well for writing or drawing on my free time.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping to get
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to get a tablet I could use to draw digitally as a hobby. The included pen made it a great deal and there are a lot of great drawing apps available. The pen is responsive and adjusts according to how much pressure I'm using, which makes it almost feel like I'm drawing using traditional media. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the silver color mod. Saved $50.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. $100 Less then the box stores. Going from a 5 year old note 10.1. Some of the apps where starting not to work. This was due to the 4.0 operating system. This is a nice unit. The on screen operating system is just like my phone. This makes it easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan J

customer_reviews.title: laggy tablet
customer_reviews.text: Tablet is slightly laggy. Each email takes a second to load. Apps are laggy. You will see the circular load button too often. Tried fixing by clearing cache but it didn't help. It also gets hot easily. Compare it to ipad6, which is slightly cheaper and much faster/smooth interface.
customer_reviews.author: Chibi

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet yet
customer_reviews.text: I have several Samsung products. This tablet is top notch. Very fast, light weight and the best I have owned so far. It is wi-fi only which is fine. You can use wi-fi just about anywhere now, you don't really need it hooked to a cell service.
customer_reviews.author: jz

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Thought I had ordered the black one but the silver arrived. No biggy, though. Still learning about it so will update later. Bought a cover/keyboard locally. Will download the Kindle app so I can download books as I see fit. Have the free Slacker on it and the speakers seem to work fine. Also figured out how to connect my Bluetooth headphones. Later!
customer_reviews.author: naftali216

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only negative thing i found is that the battery discharges quickly compared to my old galaxy tab2 & note 2 10.1 inch. Apart from the battery life I would recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Samsung Tablet yet
customer_reviews.text: The BEST Samsung Tablet yet !!! My Tab S3 and I are best of the pals. We rarely part. The performance, display, display settings are simply fantastic. I fully recommend this tablet to all.
customer_reviews.author: Manoj Makanjee

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is okay. It is not smooth during gameplay while certain background applications are running whereas, the ASUS ZenPad 3s 10 9.7 doesn't stutter like this. There are a lot of extra sensors that are fun to play with however, there seems to be an error in fundamental functionality in ram and graphics communication. Fun tools though.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet, love the fact that it comes with a pen included just like my galaxy note. Light weight and very versatile. (The images attached are shown with a screen protector already installed, that's not how it comes out of the box obviously)
customer_reviews.author: sharon l.

customer_reviews.title: Compact yet powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet.......and the responsive customer service!! First tablet would not power up therefore returned it. Received a replacement within 24 hours. No problems so far. Processing is quick .User friendly. Appreciate the seamless transition of apps and info from my 5 year old Nexus 10. Also purchased the keyboard cover which I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SJHum

customer_reviews.title: Very good tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I now use this for most of my freelance art projects and I loooooove it. The stylus is so sensitive and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line visuals.....So vivid,crisp, sharp,Amazing details,Spectacular colors....Thanks Amazon....
customer_reviews.text: The Best Tablet out there,The picture,Amazing Ultra High Definition with Samsungs AMOLED Screen,very fast,....I have researched,and have had quite a few Tablets and Phones,This is the best........This Tablet ,spectacular colors and the sharpness of this Samsung Galaxy Tab S3 will blow you away.......
customer_reviews.author: Boston

customer_reviews.title: NO battery life
customer_reviews.text: this product has ZERO battery life! this is my 2nd Samsung tablet and the last generation was WAY BETTER! The connection to wifi and the processor to change pages is AWFUL. We dont use it enough (because we use our old one) to have sent it back by the deadline. otherwise it would have gone back!
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey m jackman

customer_reviews.title: she loved it and is switching from an old iPad
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for Mom; she loved it and is switching from an old iPad. Our family isn't a fan of iPad because they don't allow you to expand the memory; once you buy an iPad if you run out of memory, you're screwed. With the S3 you can always buy an SD card.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Galvez ESpinoza

customer_reviews.title: Battery ran dead after a year and a half
customer_reviews.text: The tablet was lightly used for a year and a half. After that the battery died. Even when it was working, the screen would skip while scrolling. Not worth the $. The s2 was much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent upgrade from my old Dell tablet
customer_reviews.text: Powered up, logged into my G-mail account, and the new Samsung started importing everything from my old Dell tablet which had been backed up to some Google cloud, apparently. Even my photo which had been the background on the Dell was migrated and set as the background on the Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a great tablet but I did have trouble with the battery draining very quickly even after disabling background apps. After a hard reset it seems to be working much better.
customer_reviews.author: blue_skies

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to process and store pictures which my previous tablet couldn't do. I find myself using this for most of my electronic activities. I keep finding more stuff it can do and the pen is fantastic. Not a bit sorry I went the big bucks for this tab.
customer_reviews.author: damfyno

customer_reviews.title: Amazon won't live up to the 4 year protection plan.
customer_reviews.text: My Samsung Galaxy Tab S3 9.7-Inch, 32GB is dying. It takes a long time react to stimulus. Sometimes it gets stuck. Sometimes it burns hot. I have a Asurion 4 Year Tablet Accident Protection Plan ($500 - $599.99) via Amazon. How can I replace this one?
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, lightweight and great programs and apps that work on this device. I really enjoy the S Pen, once you get use to it you can't feel the difference with a real pencil.
customer_reviews.author: GUSTAVO SOLDI

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool, I'm glad for this instead of a touch screen pc. Team Samsung
customer_reviews.text: (non-technical) First tablet, nineteenth Samsung... Why did I put off this purchase. Very nice tablet. Brilliant display, great battery use and charging rate. The S-Pen is a great tool. I have yet to be disappointed. I was back and forth, looking at an expensive two-in-one tablet/pc. With web based apps (the whole Microsoft suite available on a browser) I trust this tablet to do many pc things. I wouldn't trust a child with mine without a child-proof case. Not much media, I've yet to need a SD card. Thanks Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Merryman

customer_reviews.title: I am still using it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The fact that I can increase the memory makes it just so much better. Now I can download so many shows and movies from Netflix and Amazon for internet-less viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Fallenpieta

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best tablets out there but the cost is overpriced
customer_reviews.author: Baseball Fan

customer_reviews.title: Samsung is always my choise
customer_reviews.text: It was a great choise, its my secont Samsung tablet and I really like this
customer_reviews.author: @lwagneth

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my tab S2. It is awesome! The picture and sound are great. I am loving some new features. It is a little heavier than the S2, but it us a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Dee K.

customer_reviews.title: Gone bad after 10 months of a gentle usage
customer_reviews.text: It was a great tablet to use. Unfortunately, it is totally stuck now course of a hardware problem after only 10 months of a gentle usage and could not be used anymore. Shame on Samsung
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old daughter loves this tablet. She had an iPad before but is way more impressed with the galaxy tab. She draws a lot and watches YouTube on it. Perfect gift. Her uncle bought her an excellent wireless keyboard/case that works great and complements the tablet nicely
customer_reviews.author: CESA

customer_reviews.title: Say goodbye to your iPad
customer_reviews.text: Samaung has finally made a better tab than the iPad with the tab3. It contends with the iPad pro and you do not have to an extra 100 for the pen. This performs as great as any tab on the market. I am blown away by how it looks as well
customer_reviews.author: THANKS

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet. With the accuracy of the pen it makes it very easy to do my art work. Also does a great job of converting handwritten notes into types notes. Only down fall is the back is also glass
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 year and 9 months
customer_reviews.text: It's great except it died in less than 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Really Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is just what I needed. Everything is operating super well. Stylus is really nice. I put a rubber case with the strap on the back for home Inspections and it is even better! takes great photos, and has a flash!
customer_reviews.author: tmbirdsall

customer_reviews.title: super nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: Wow, super nice tablet, very light and sleek, great battery run time. The screen resolution is the best I have ever seen, extremely clear and vibrant. Great processing power and WiFi performance is excellent. Could have more embedded RAM but compensates by having support for large remivable SDRAM.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and bright and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My old tablet was 6+ years old, so I splurged a little bit after reading reviews. Tablets sure have gotten smaller and lighter! The screen in bright. The sound is great for watching shows. I think android is easy to use, so very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K.Love

customer_reviews.title: Sluggish for some reason.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, prefer the aspect ratio of this one over the tab s4, but my unit was a little slow. It stuttered with simple animations sometimes. I didn't expect that from a snapdragon 835, that was in a brand new unit. I ended up returning it and bought a tab s4.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Samsung is the best
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, excellent condition with S pen. Very impressed with this tablet. Very good quality, fast, expandable memory, color is great, tablet is awesome! I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B-Happy

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for high end users
customer_reviews.text: Great, fast, powerful tablet. Not a huge fan that the stylus does not slip inside the tablet like Galaxy Note models, but the larger more comfortable feel is a good trade off.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Powell

customer_reviews.title: screen flickering already after one year of purchase?
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, when not defective. But, Bought it in Nov., 2018, recently the screen is starting to turn black when touched somewhere on on of the sides or tilted. A whole-tablet protector has been worn since I bought it. In just one year it's starting giving me problem? Nice done, Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great, not amazing
customer_reviews.text: An awesome tablet The only two donwsides to it are - 1. Performance - aren't as smooth and lightning fast as one would expect. 2. The home button is located in an annoying position. It's be ideal to have no physical button but rather a in-disolay one, such as the Nexus 9 has, so whenever you are in landscape mode, the button follows and no need to reposition your hands when using the tablet. Good value for money for around ~$450
customer_reviews.author: Nitzan Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Tablet works fine. The only small issue I have is the ...
customer_reviews.text: Tablet works fine. The only small issue I have is the sound needs to be more balanced. You have to put the sound on full to be able to hear the dialog. As I said just a minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford L.

customer_reviews.title: Slow and bad battery
customer_reviews.text: Significantly slower than my original Galaxy Tab 10.1". Also the battery life is abysmal. The older tablet would last about a week off the charger... this one might last 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Nice big screen great picture
customer_reviews.text: I really like my new tablet. I like the larger screen. It takes a little time, at least for me, to use new stylus. I am still learning how to use tablet.
customer_reviews.author: plp

customer_reviews.title: I love this samsung tab 3 sm-ts820
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet I have had several over the last couple years but the clarity and the speed as well as the storage on this is fantastic. I am so glad I spent my money on this tablet
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: So far I like it and I like the features that comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this Tablet on Monday (4/2/2018), so I am still getting used to the features that are on this device. So far I like it and I like the features that comes with it. The S Pen is a great tool and I like how it can be used in so many ways. The more I learn the features the more I like it. I wanted something a little high end and this is fitting the bill so far. If I start to change my opinion I may update this review, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma T

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Practically a PC! Its a great little computer... oh you call it a tablet, but this thing really is a full computer only smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Dadeo

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best tablet I've ever had. Blinding speed, mind-blowing sharp screen. And with S Pen the s3 Tab has far more capabilities than I'll ever use. I like having them, though, especially Office. I'm slow as molasses, but my computer has to be quicker than lightening .. this comes close. Oh, go with the silver .. you only go around once!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny. It's a lot of them but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I use it every day. It's up there in price close to some laptops but I needed a tablet without a keyboard and the screen is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: LKNANML

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S3 9.7-Inch, 32GB Tablet (Silver, SM-T820NZSAXAR)
product_meta.description: Style:Tablet| Color:SilverDo what you want when you want with the new Galaxy Tab S3, the tablet that redefines what you can do with one device. Whether you're working, playing, creating or gaming, the Galaxy Tab S3 is a blank canvas, a theater screen, and a productivity hub all in one.
feature_bullets: Includes the Samsung S Pen Stylus; Expandable memory up to 400GB; Processor Speed: Quad Core(2.15 GHz + 1.6 GHz Quad)
Featuring High Dynamic Range on a Super AMOLED display, the Galaxy Tab S3 delivers cinematic vividness, detail and deep contrast to a screen that fits in your hands
Our revolutionary S Pen is more precise and pressure-responsive than ever, and never needs to be charged, liberating you to create, translate, and navigate without limits
Powerful Quad speakers, tuned by AKG, calibrate with your movements as you rotate the Galaxy Tab S3, and intuitively reflect what’s playing on-screen
Easily switch from touch to type with a feather-light keyboard that auto-pairs, attaches on contact and never needs charging (keyboard sold separately)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,268 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
